name: Drawing Edge
description:
Drawing Edge is a new interface for NFT collectors to design and mint their own custom NFT's by simple drawing a 2d line and watching as it forms their very own blade. This system runs of the ChainSafe api allowing users to sign in to their metamask accounts and mint their new weapon without even leaving the site. Preview today for your chance to start your NFT journey or expand the crusade you've already began.

For the team behind ChainSafe or any curious as to how the code works, they can view the behind the scenes video on google drive:

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1La64BI1v1ossTjE_wds8tUdblWV3_Csv?usp=sha...
